titleStmt.title: Mense Iunii. anno regni metue[n]dissimi d[omi]ni u[e]ri regio Henrici octaui .xxii. A proclamation made and diuysed by the kyngis highnes, with the aduise of his most honorable counsaile, for punishinge of vacabundes and sturdy beggars
Proclamations. 1530-06
titleStmt.author: England. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Bertheletus regius impressor excusit. Cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
